title.rendered: Peer Impact on Profile Completion with Florida Atlantic University

content.rendered:
From Florida Atlantic University: “The presentation will review how we have utilized our Career Ambassador Program (undergraduate students) to help increase profile completion with residential students. Students are assigned caseloads of other students to reach out to build connections with and help ensure they are completing their profile. The help students though 1:1 meetings, group meetings, tabling events and office hours in the residence halls.”

View more career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: Learn about Florida Atlantic’s Career Ambassador Program to help increase Handshake profile completion
